description: Number of "connected animals" formed from n square- or hexagon-connected truncated octahedra in the b.c.c. lattice, allowing translation and rotations of the lattice.
links: S. T. Coffin, Puzzling World of Polyhedral Dissections, Oxford Univ. Press, 1991.
Index entries for sequences related to b.c.c. lattice
author: Torsten Sillke (TORSTEN.SILLKE(AT)LHSYSTEMS.COM).
extensions: Corrected and extended by Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)HRZ.Uni-Bielefeld.DE)
